sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app>
    <NavbarComponent/>
    <v-container>
      <v-row fluid>
        <v-col>
          <CarouselComponent />
        </v-col>
      </v-row>
      <v-row>
        <v-col>
          <HomeComponent />
        </v-col>
      </v-row>
      <v-row>
        <v-col>
          <!-- Remove CartComponent and DisplayCartItems from here -->
          <router-view /> <!-- This will render components based on the route -->
        </v-col>
      </v-row>
      <v-row>
        <v-col>
          <ProductCurosel />
        </v-col>
      </v-row>
    </v-container>
    <FooterComponent />
  </v-app>
</template>

<script>
import NavbarComponent from './components/Navbar.vue';
import HomeComponent from './components/HomeComponent.vue';
import CarouselComponent from './components/carouselComponent.vue';
import ProductCurosel from './components/ProductCurosel.vue';
import FooterComponent from './components/FooterComponent.vue';

export default {
  name: 'App',
  components: {
    NavbarComponent,
    HomeComponent,
    CarouselComponent,
    ProductCurosel,
    FooterComponent,
  },
};
</script>

<style>
/* Global styles can be added here */
.sticky-navbar {
  position: sticky;
  top: 0;
  z-index: 1000;
  /* Ensure the navbar stays above other content */
}
</style>
